column3: Hey! Didn't I see you in the Boyahda Tree? Get anything good from Aquarius?
I'm something of a treasure hunter, and judging by your gear, I'd say you've claimed your fair share of spoils too.
Say, isn't that a fire staff? A fine choice. I've heard it's Shantotto's favorite, though knowing her, she probably wields a Vulcan's Staff.
Is that...koenig armor!? How in the world did you get the abjuration to purify it? I tried for weeks to hunt one, but someone always beat me to the punch.
Getting your hands on Ares' armor is no mean feat. I don't know what's worse, the Qiqirn treasure hunters constantly running away, or the chariots and their homing missiles.
Well I'll be damned... Kirin's Osode. My sympathies to the ninja that helped you get that.
It's always nice to see a fellow adventurer who appreciates the merits of a scorpion harness. If only Serket didn't always leave a mountain of bodies in its wake...
That's a fine vermilion cloak you've got there. Were you one of the lucky ones who nabbed their cloth from Aquarius? I've heard rumors that the bastard doesn't drop it anymore.
I hope you had an easier time summoning Hakutaku than I did. I thought my heart stopped the first time I failed making an eye cluster...
I like your hairpin. Brings back memories of my days hunting in Valkurm. The sounds of the beach were always so soothing.
Nothing like a pair of strider boots to help make a quick exit, eh?
Is that a Cassie earring? It's beautiful to be sure, but I'm not sure it's worth dealing with such a nasty morbol. Just the thought of being drawn into its clutches makes my fur stand on end.
<gasp> A defending ring! B-But they're so rare! I'm sure white mages are constantly falling over themselves to join your parties.
Well, I must say I'm impressed. If you happen to find anything else of interest, I'd love to see it.
Hmmm... Or maybe not. If you happen to find anything interesting, I'd love to see it.
